page.title: 11St.David's Ch.Prendergast
page.content: St.David's Church was built in 1191 but the only parts which are original today are the porch and tower top. In 1863 a new Rector arrived named {*** Francis Foster *** He had a brother who was an architect, who demolished the church & rebuilt it except for the tower top; it had been leaking so much that a man called William Watts Harris took an umbrella with him when he went under the tower! They rebuilt the church for {!*! Â£2000.00 !*! Apart from being a Rector, Francis Foster was also a BOXER and a GOOD ICE SKATER.People said that he could skate { !*!*! THE LORD'S PRAYER ON ICE !*!*! There is a stained_glass window to commemorate Francis Foster _ it is an { !*! exact replica of his face !*! Cromwell's guns on Prendergast Chur. walls demolished Haverfordwest Castle.
